TEXT.TITLE: IOMEGA <IOMG> IN SUPPLY AGREEMENT
TEXT.BODY: Iomega Corp said it has signed a four-year agreement to supply Beta-20 disk drives with removable cartridges to <Leading Edge Hardware Products Inc>. Value was not disclosed. The company said shipments will stgart in the second quarter of 1987. Reuter
